title: BLACK+DECKER Crisp 'N Bake Air Fryer Toaster Oven Combo, 12 in 1 Countertop Convection Oven Cooks Food Fast, Fits a Whole Pizza or 6 Toast Slices, French Doors with Stainless Steel Finish
description: Transform your kitchen into a culinary haven with the BLACK+DECKER Crisp N Bake Air Fryer Oven featuring premium French doors and stainless-steel accents for a sleek and convenient cooking experience. Boasting a compact design, this oven effortlessly fits into any space, allowing you to cook full family meals without clutter. The versatile 12 cooking functions, including Convection Baking, Pizza, Air Fry, and Roast, eliminate guesswork and elevate your dishes to gourmet levels. Unlock the potential to cook a generous 12" family-size pizza or 6 slices of toast with ease. Experience the magic of convection technology as it rapidly circulates hot air, giving your meals that perfect crunch and deep-fried taste without excess fat. The intuitive selection dial with cooking indicator simplifies the cooking process, turning red when actively cooking and blue during standby. Enjoy the convenience of a 60-minute timer, providing precise control over your culinary creations. The easy-view glass door lets you monitor your food without sacrificing heat, ensuring every dish comes out perfectly. Plus, this Air Fryer Oven comes complete with dishwasher-safe accessories, including an Air Fry Basket, Bake Pan, Crumb Tray, and Rack, for hassle-free cleanup. Redefine efficiency with a convection fan that cuts cooking time by over 2.5x, making your favorite meals ready in no time. Elevate your kitchen aesthetics and cooking efficiency with the BLACK+DECKER Crisp N Bake Air Fryer Oven – where style meets substance, and every meal becomes a culinary masterpiece.
